Server side:

case 7811: c.deleteItem(7811, c.getItemSlot(7811), 1); c.sM("You throw the teletab on ground..."); c.setAnimation(827); c.specGFX(580); c.toX = 3213; c.toY = 3424; break;

Client Side:

if(i == 7811){ class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[2] = "Teleport"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 0xFFFFFF; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 0; class8.anInt174 = 12325; class8.anInt190 = 500; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = 0; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = 0; // model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 0; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt181 = 440; class8.anInt169 = 0; class8.anInt194 = 1; class8.aBoolean176 = true; class8.aString170 = "Wilderness"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A Teleportation Tablet ".getBytes(); }
